Comments_List: General knowledge of the department, tips for success in graduate school, in depth look at career paths and what academic life is like
I learned about the various professors in the EEB department.
It was a lot of fun when there was discussion but occasionally professors would give ~2 hour job talk
I think the professors should be given clear instructions for what is expected during the two hour session.
It's a great way to learn about the department and ask professor's questions.
